actions.text: On agreeing to the Kirkpatrick amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A023) offered by Mrs. Kirkpatrick to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A023) offered by Mrs. Kirkpatrick to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kirkpatrick amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment allows additional states that have passed distracted driving legislation to qualify for incentive grant funding.
purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to increase safety by allowing additional states that have passed distracted driving legislation to qualify for incentive grant funding.
